reviewText:
Product received for free

A Precision Platformerhttps://youtu.be/oXsNJBJ02rA
+ Interesting concept, you play as white blood cells within a body and your goal to to get to and destroy the germs
+ Great platforming controls (with controller)
+ Pretty fun gameplay with some nice mechanics like Super Meat Boy-like wall jumping, sprint jumping, rolling, and so on.
+ The environments are very unique and does a great job to capture what it may be like within a body
+ Quite a bit of content 75 levels and a level creator

- You simutaneously play as a collection of 20 blood cells, I believe you need over half of them to reach the objective, although I found it irrating as your group will often spread out and easily die even though your main cell lives on.  I feel like the game would be improved a bit if you only played as one cell.
- Many levels seem a bit too dark, with patches of light. I know you are supposed to be in a body, but I felt like more lighting would have been nice, at least to see the backgrounds.
